Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

Reverb 1 Filter

Discussion

This filter is designed to enhance vocals or provide ambiance for small areas. This effect does not work well on quick impulse type sounds such as drum beats (for those types of sounds use the Reverb 2 or Reverb 3 effects). This filter is faster than the Reverb 2 and 3 filters, but is still much slower than the built-in, but somewhat low-quality, Miles reverb.

Preferences:

"Reverb Time": Duration of reverb. Range: 0.01 to 1000.0 milliseconds.

"Reverb Mix": Mix of reverb signal. Range: 0.00 (original - dry) to 1.0 % (fully reverb - wet).


Group: Digital Filter Services
Related Sections: Reverb 2 Filter, Reverb 3 Filter
